ad_text: Fiber Transport Sponsored In search of a log truck driver in the Mobile, AL or Bay Minette, AL or Cantonment, FL area and surrounding areas. Driver must have at least 2 years experience with a class A CDL and log truck driving experience is also preferred. Driver would be hauling off of the Creola woodyard to IP Cantonment. Will be able to work Monday thru Friday rain or shine and will be home every night. We also offer holiday pay, health insurance, life insurance and other benefits. Please send us a message for more info or fill out our application online at Tenstreet at this link https://intelliapp.driverapponline.com/c/fiber-transport FULL-TIME · $240 - $250 / DAY · CREOLA, ALABAMA Log Truck Driver Apply now
